title: GetUnversionedSDKUnionMetadataLocation requires Windows SDK installation
body:
`Microsoft.Build.UnitTests.ToolLocationHelper_Tests.GetUnversionedSDKUnionMetadataLocation` fails with a `NullReferenceException` when run on a machine that doesn't have the Windows SDK, version 10.0.10586.0 installed.

It looks like we could fake this in a similar way to how [`GetVersionedSDKUnionMetadataLocation`](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/7a49764a4cf5a5aef2e16f5900edf61bd295dcc1/src/Utilities/UnitTests/ToolLocationHelper_Tests.cs#L169) does it.
